definition: to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]
Feast of All Souls (fifteenth day of seventh lunar month) (Buddhism)
water pot or goblet (for Chinese calligraphy)
erhua variant of 痰盂[tan2 yu2]
If the basin is square, the water in it will also be square. (idiom)

sentences.english: I bought this magazine on the recommendation of friend.
sentences.chinese: 我由盂一位朋友推薦而抿濾這本書。

sentences.english: Summary: Displaced intra-articular fractures of the glenoid are rare and frequently result from high-energy injuries.
sentences.chinese: 移位的肩胛盂骨折是少見的有高能量損傷引起的骨折。

sentences.english: The glenoid measurements were glenoid version and bone loss.
sentences.chinese: 關節盂的測量分爲關節盂側轉與骨缺損。

sentences.english: The glenoid measurements were glenoid version and bone loss.
sentences.chinese: 關節盂的測量分爲關節盂側轉與骨缺損。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the use of arthroscopy in diagnosis and treatment of acetabular labral tear.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討髖關節鏡對髖臼盂脣撕裂的診斷和治療作用。

sentences.english: Structural abnormalities of the hip also can lead to a hip labral tear.
sentences.chinese: 髖關節結構異常也可導致髖關節盂脣撕裂。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the manifestations of glenohumeral instability on CT arthrography.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結分析盂肱關節不穩在CT關節造影上的表現。

sentences.english: Fixation with the suture anchor is reliable and makes the operation simple.
sentences.chinese: 帶線錨釘固定前盂脣可靠，操作簡便。

sentences.english: Conclusion Glenoid labrum is one of the most frequent parts of shoulder joint to be injured.
sentences.chinese: 結論盂脣是肩關節內損傷的好發部位之一。

definition: ancient ceramic three-legged vessel used for cooking with cord markings on the outside and hollow legs
a kind of vase (old)/see 安瓿[an1 bu4]
small earthenware plate or basin/a monk's alms bowl/Sanskrit paatra
